footer.description: We are GoUni, your ally in university mobility. Share rides, connect with friends, and help reduce traffic in your city. Join today and be part of the change!

benefit1.title: Save Money
benefit1.description: Share transportation costs with your classmates and reduce your daily expenses.

benefit2.title: Make New Friends
benefit2.description: Meet other students and expand your university social circle.

benefit3.title: Care for the Environment
benefit3.description: Reduce your carbon footprint by sharing rides with other students.

benefit4.title: Travel Safely
benefit4.description: Enjoy a user verification system for greater peace of mind.

benefit5.title: Flexibility
benefit5.description: Adapt your trips to your schedule and university needs.

benefit6.title: University Community
benefit6.description: Be part of an exclusive network of students from your university.

placeholder.name: Enter your full name

header.title: Who Are We?
header.subtitle: Transforming university transportation with innovative technology.

home.title: Travel comfortably, safely, and affordably with GoUni
home.description: Share rides with your university classmates. Save money, make friends, and help the environment.
home.loginLink: Already have an account? Log in

step1.title: 1. Register
step1.description: Create your profile with your university email and verify your account

step2.title: 2. Search or Post Rides
step2.description: Find fellow students heading to your university or post your route

step3.title: 3. Ride and Save
step3.description: Share costs, reduce emissions, and make new friends

student.title: Student Plan
student.feature3: Double points in the first month

security.description: At GoUni, we take our users' safety very seriously. We implement rigorous measures to ensure safe and reliable rides.
security.benefit3: Share trip details with trusted contacts
